headline: Align Technology (ALGN) Showcases Digital Dentistry Innovations at 2025 Invisalign GP Summit
summary: Align Technology (ALGN) recently held the 2025 Invisalign GP Summit, demonstrating its continuous focus on innovation and professional development in digital dentistry. Despite this key event, the company's stock price movement remained flat last week amidst an overall market upswing. With the S&P 500 and Nasdaq reaching new highs and a favorable decrease in the Producer Prices Index, the broader market sentiment was largely positive. While Align's summit emphasized growth and technology...

headline: Align Technology Hosts the 2025 Invisalign® GP Summit, Its Premier Education Event for Dental Practices to Explore the Latest Invisalign® System, iTero™ Scanner, and Align™ Digital Platform Innovations
summary: LAS VEGAS & SAN JOSE, Calif. & TEMPE, Ariz., September 10, 2025--Align Technology, Inc. ("Align") (Nasdaq: ALGN), a leading global medical device company that designs, manufactures, and sells the Invisalign® System of clear aligners, iTero™ intraoral scanners, and exocad™ CAD/CAM software for digital orthodontics and restorative dentistry, today shared highlights from the 2025 Invisalign® GP Summit, Align’s premier clinical education and peer-to-peer networking experience designed to help doctor
